text:
Instruction: Convert the provided Jinja template to its equivalent Blended template. Blended is a variant of Jinja with strict type checking and scoping rules.

### Task Description:
write a valid jinja template to convert variable "email" to lowercase and store in new_email variable

### Jinja Template:
{% set new_email = email | lower %}

### Blended Template:
{% set new_email = lower(email) %}

Instruction: Convert the provided Jinja template to its equivalent Blended template. Blended is a variant of Jinja with strict type checking and scoping rules.

### Task Description:
write a valid jinja template to convert "USERNAME" to lowercase and print it

### Jinja Template:
{{ "USERNAME" | lower }}

### Blended Template:
{% print lower("USERNAME") %}

Instruction: Convert the provided Jinja template to its equivalent Blended template. Blended is a variant of Jinja with strict type checking and scoping rules.

### Task Description:
Write a jinja template to print "Hello World" and 42.

### Jinja Template:
{{ "Hello World" }}   
{{ 42 }}             

### Blended Template:
{% print "Hello World" %}   
{% print 42 %}

Instruction: Convert the provided Jinja template to its equivalent Blended template. Blended is a variant of Jinja with strict type checking and scoping rules.

### Task Description:
write a valid jinja template to truncate variable "weight" and store in int_weight variable

### Jinja Template:
{% set int_weight = weight | truncate %}

### Blended Template:
{% set int_weight = truncate(weight) %}
